dcterms:description: A balanced dataset produced by The International Survey on Emotion Antecedents and Reactions database, used for analyzing emotions in text.
dcterms:title: ISEAR

dcterms:description: A manually labelled multi-turn dialogue dataset that is not balanced, used for text emotion classification in the context of meme generation.
dcterms:title: dailydialog
